content.content: Join Omkarâ€™s Affiliates Program
50% CPA
FAQs
How it works?
How it works?
You can earn a 50% commission every month for 24 months for every customer you refer to Omkar Cloud using your unique link.
Additionally, the person who uses your link will receive a discount of 10% on their payments for a duration of 24 months.
For example, if five people purchase the Monthly Unlimited Plan for $35 per month through your referral link, you will earn $87.5 every month, which is 50% of $35 multiplied by 5.
Why should I join your Affiliate Program?
Why should I join your Affiliate Program?
By Partnering with Omkar Cloud you get our credibility, social status, and product quality.
As an affiliate, you do not need to make products, handle payments, or provide customer support.
All you need to do is get people to visit Omkar Cloud using your unique affiliate link, and you earn revenue month after month.
Some important Reasons to partner with us are
Membership Product:
High Commission:
Free Tier:
How much can I earn as your affiliate?
How much can I earn as your affiliate?
It depends on your level of dedication and effort.
A few will earn Thousands of Dollars, some will earn earn hundreds of Dollars and most will not earn anything at all.
How much can I earn per Sale?
How much can I earn per Sale?

Omkar Cloud offers a straightforward pricing plan model, consisting of a free plan and a single unlimited plan priced at $28 per month when purchased annually and $35 per month when purchased on a monthly basis.
If your referral purchases the monthly plan, you will earn $17.5 per month. Alternatively, if they opt for the yearly plan, you will earn $14 per month.
Is there a minimum payout threshold?
Is there a minimum payout threshold?
Unlike many software companies, we don't hold your money until you reach a minimum payout amount.
We will send you the full amount that is available in your account.
How do I get paid?
How do I get paid?
We will contact you to request your payout details, we support UPI, Paypal, or direct bank transfer.
Please note that payments are made on the 1st day of every month and 30 days after the customer has paid since we offer a 30-day refund period.
Also, You can track your earnings easily through the dashboard.
What happens if person does not use my affiliate link but still signs up later?
What happens if person does not use my affiliate link but still signs up later?
Once a person clicks on your referral link, our affiliate tracking system gets activated even if it is not their first visit to our site.
Now in case they sign up later but have clicked on your referral link, then your referral link will be activated :)
However, if they have already visited us using another affiliate's link before using your affiliate link, then first affiliate's link will be activated.
How do I join the affiliate program?
How do I join the affiliate program?
To join our affiliate program, simply follow these steps:
Create an account on omkar.cloud
Click on the Referral Program option in the navbar
You will receive a referral link, which you can use to refer others and earn.
What strategies can I use to make sales with Omkar Cloud?
What strategies can I use to make sales with Omkar Cloud?
There are several strategies you can use to get people to try Omkar Cloud and earn revenue:
YouTube Strategy: Create videos on topics relevant to lead generation, and add a call to action to visit Omkar Cloud using your affiliate link at the end of the video.

Group Posting Strategy: Join multiple lead generation groups on Facebook and LinkedIn, write engaging posts in all the groups, and send a message to those who comment to use Omkar Cloud using your affiliate link.
DM Strategy: DM people you provide Lead Generation Services to use Omkar Cloud.
Do you offer affiliate training?
Do you offer affiliate training?
Yes, we have a top notch affiliate training video which teaches you about various strategies to boost your earnings. Watch our training course at
Your Success
